titleStmt.title: A short discourse, tending to the pacification of all unhappy differences, between His Majesty and His Parliament shewing the meanes whereby the same may speedily be done, and that it rests in His Maiesties sole power to effect it : presented to the consideration of all those that love the truth and peace / by a Friend and servant to both.
titleStmt.author: Friend and servant to both.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
